thread.title: Ohio bill could reduce prison time for nonviolent offenders who violate parole
thread.title_full: Ohio bill could reduce prison time for nonviolent offenders who violate parole

author: Jackie Borchardt, cleveland.com
title: Ohio bill could reduce prison time for nonviolent offenders who violate parole
text: A bipartisan Ohio bill would eliminate mandatory prison sentences for minor parole violations and make other changes intended to keep nonviolent offenders out of prison and save state money.
